main.java.de.bsi.tsesimulator.tse.crypto

Class SignatureAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.java.de.bsi.tsesimulator.tse.crypto.SignatureAlgorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ECDSA, ECSDSA

    public abstract class SignatureAlgorithm
extends java.lang.Object
    The abstract class that makes it possible for the CryptoCore to use a signature algorithm regardless of the question which signature algorithm is really used. It requires each implementation of a signature algorithm to have a sign and a verify method. Additionally, each signature algorithm has to provide a method to get the public key from it and a method to get information on the algorithm.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    dpottkaemper

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SignatureAlgorithm()
      an abstract algorithm class that makes sure that the CryptoCore can either use an ECDSA or an ECSDSA
